summary: This MOD  adds new shouts that enchant weapons with elemental damage.
descriptionHtml:
===================================
Elemental Weapon Shouts v1.0
===================================
This MOD  adds new shouts that enchant weapons with elemental damage. 
When the 2nd or 3rd word is acquired, the shout can be acquired. 
(When word ZUN is acquired, these shout cannot be acquired.)
[youtube]
<object width=\"1280\" height=\"720\"><param name=\"movie\" value=\"http://www.youtube.com/v/aZ1zlW8pR54&hl=en_US&feature=player_embedded&version=3\"></param><param name=\"allowFullScreen\" value=\"true\"></param><param name=\"allowScriptAccess\" value=\"always\"></param><embed src=\"http://www.youtube.com/v/aZ1zlW8pR54&hl=en_US&feature=player_embedded&version=3\" type=\"application/x-shockwave-flash\" allowfullscreen=\"true\" allowScriptAccess=\"always\" width=\"1280\" height=\"720\"></embed></object>
[/youtube]
[youtube]
<object width=\"1280\" height=\"720\"><param name=\"movie\" value=\"http://www.youtube.com/v/uvbq6Zu6Odo&hl=en_US&feature=player_embedded&version=3\"></param><param name=\"allowFullScreen\" value=\"true\"></param><param name=\"allowScriptAccess\" value=\"always\"></param><embed src=\"http://www.youtube.com/v/uvbq6Zu6Odo&hl=en_US&feature=player_embedded&version=3\" type=\"application/x-shockwave-flash\" allowfullscreen=\"true\" allowScriptAccess=\"always\" width=\"640\" height=\"360\"></embed></object>
[/youtube]

Shout explanation
=======================

Fire Weapon
=======================
-Word 
Zun(Weapon) Toor(Inferno) Shul(Sun)
-Effect explanation
Fire damage and attack speed up enchant added to weapons.
-Effet time
15 seconds
-Effect
-------------------
-The first stage
+5 Fire Damage
attack speed UP 5%
-------------------
-The second stage
+10 Fire Damage
Attack speed UP 10%
-------------------
-The third stage
+15 Fire Damage
Attack speed UP 15%
--------------------

Ice Weapon
=======================
-Word
Zun(Weapon) Krah(Cold) Diin(Freeze)
-Effect explanation
The ice damage and attack speed up enchant added to weapons. 
-Effect time
15 seconds
-Effect
---------------------
The first stage
+5 Ice Damage
attack speed UP 5%
---------------------
The second stage
+10 Ice Damage
Attack speed UP 10%
---------------------
The third stage
+15 Ice Damage
attack speed UP 15%
---------------------

Shock Weapon
=======================
- Word
Zun (Weapon) Bah (Wrath) Qo (Lightning)
- Effect explanation
Shock damage and attack speed up enchant added to weapons. 
- Effect time
15 seconds
- Effect
---------------------
The first stage
+5 Shock Damage
Attack speed UP 5%
---------------------
The second stage
+10 Shock Damage
Attack speed UP 10%
---------------------
The third stage
+15 Shock Damage
attack speed UP 15%
---------------------
author: Khyrin
